""" low = 0 high = len(arr) - 1 i = 0 while i <= high: if arr[i] == 0: arr[i], arr[low] = arr[low], arr[i] low += 1 i += 1 elif arr[i] == 2: arr[i], arr[high] = arr[high], arr[i] high -= 1 else: i += 1 return arr
